tool_description: Ask questions using natural language about images of your receipts.
name: Receipt Image Question Answering
title: Receipt Image Question Answering

api_list.name: Receipt Parsing
api_list.description: Parse a receipt image from any format and get returned JSON
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://receipt-image-question-answering.p.rapidapi.com/parse"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "receipt-image-question-answering.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Receipt Question Answering
api_list.description:
Ask a question about your receipt.

The API takes two parameters `image_url` and `question`.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://receipt-image-question-answering.p.rapidapi.com/ask"

headers = {

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "receipt-image-question-answering.p.rapidapi.com"
        }
